description.text: You write instructions or other information on parchment, paper, or any suitable writing material. The illusory script appears to be some form of foreign or magical writing. Only the person (or people) designated by you at the time of the casting can read the writing; it's unintelligible to any other character.

sections.Components: V, S, M (lead-based ink worth 50 gp)
sections.Targets: one touched object weighing no more than 10 lbs.
